summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1691, for the improvement of Grand Boulevard from the east line of 24th Avenue West to the east line of 26th Avenue West in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, and constructing wooden walks thereon, under Ordinance No. 17915 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
